basics.name: Rainier Javillo
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

work.summary: I help keep inventory in stock and provide customer service
highlights: Perform daily department tasks such as transferring merchandise and processing transactions
Assist customers and coworkers in need of support

volunteer.summary: Volunteering in various community service activities and projects

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: For students who graduated from a public Hawaii high school in spring 2005 or later, have a high school GPA of at least a 3.0, meet certain academic criteria, eligible for the Federal Pell Grant, and a bonafide Hawaii resident.

awards.title: ABC Stores Jumpstart Scholarship Fund
awards.summary: This scholarship was established to further the education of ABC Stores' employees and their dependents.  Awardees are chosen for their academic promise and commitment to higher education.
